name: ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
The ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods is a free plugin allows you to hide certain shipping methods based on shipping class, order weight, other existing shipping methods, etc. You can hide WooCommerce default shipping methods as well as third-party shipping services from DHL, USPS, Stamps.com, UPS, FedEx, EasyPost, Australia Post, and so on.

Features & Use Cases of Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods Plugin

  • Hide all shipping methods when Free Shipping is available.
  • Hide all shipping methods when Local Pickup is available.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Shipping Classes.
  • Hide WooCommerce Default Shipping methods & Shipping Methods from Third Party Developers.
  • Hide Shipping Methods & Options based on Various Conditions.
  • Configure the Conditions based on Various Filtering Options.
  • Create and Manage an Unlimited Number of Rules to Hide Shipping Methods.

Premium version Features

For complete list of latest features and details, please visit ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods Plugin premium version product page.

  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Product Category.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Order Subtotal.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Destination Countries.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Postal/Zip Code.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Product SKU.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Order Weight.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on User Roles.
  • Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods based on Specific Shipping Options in the WooCommerce Shipping Methods.
  • Hide Specific Services from Shipping Carriers.
  • Timely compatibility updates and bug fixes.
  • Premium Support!

Premium Version walkthrough Video

Documentation

Visit the Product Documentation for ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods Plugin.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
1.What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?
If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at the plugin support section on WordPress Org. Our team will respond soon.
